pkgmetadata.longdescription: Dconfig - Bootstrap Configuration for Django project======[![Downloads](https://img.shields.io/travis/shinznatkid/django-config.svg)](https://travis-ci.org/shinznatkid/django-config/)[![Downloads](https://img.shields.io/pypi/dm/dconfig.svg)](https://pypi.python.org/pypi/dconfig/)[![Downloads](https://img.shields.io/pypi/v/dconfig.svg)](https://pypi.python.org/pypi/dconfig/)[![Downloads](https://img.shields.io/badge/license-MIT-blue.svg)](https://pypi.python.org/pypi/dconfig/)Dconfig is configuration by console for the Django webdevelopment framework.Support Django >= 2.0Installation------------1. Python package pip install dconfig2. Add 'dconfig' to INSTALLED_APPS: 'dconfig',Usage--------`python manage.py conf`Help--------`python manage.py conf`>>> helpWizard Setup--------`python manage.py conf`>>> init** WARNING: this action will wipeout all data in settings.py**
